Priced at $1 million for individuals and $2 million per employee for corporations, it promises accelerated processing under EB-1 or EB-2 visa categories. The program aims to generate billions in revenue, potentially reducing taxes and debt.

Yadav's curt responses and previous controversies add extra spice to the upcoming showdown.

description: Karnataka police have recovered a portion of the valuables stolen from the State Bank of India's Chadchan branch. The robbers, who fled to Maharashtra, abandoned part of their loot after a confrontation with villagers in Hulajanti village. The recovered bag contained 6.5 kg of gold jewellery and Rs 41 lakh in cash, according to Vijayapura SP Laxman Nimbargi.

title: Terror case: J&K CIK raids across Valley; Srinagar, Pulwama, Anantnag among districts targeted
description: Counter Intelligence Kashmir conducted searches at multiple locations across seven districts in the Valley on Saturday, targeting terror-related activities. The coordinated operation spanned eight locations in Srinagar, Baramulla, Anantnag, Kupwara, Handwara, Pulwama, and Shopian, following warrants obtained from a competent court. This crackdown follows a deadly terror attack in April where 26 civilians were killed in Anantnag.

title: What Trump Gold card looks like? How it differs from Corporate Gold & Platinum
description: President Trump introduced the "Gold Card Visa," offering expedited US residency for wealthy individuals and corporations investing significant sums. The Gold Card requires a $1 million contribution, while the Platinum Card, pending approval, demands $5 million with tax benefits. Revenue will fund commerce promotion and debt reduction, potentially reshaping immigration policy by replacing existing visa programs.

Despite the setback, India secured a 21-run victory over Oman. Sanju Samson and Abhishek Sharma's contributions helped India post a total of 188/8. Arshdeep Singh also celebrated claiming his 100th T20I wicket.

title: Over 100 SIMs, endless messages: Man stalked woman for more than 2 years on LinkedIn
description: A finance company director in Mumbai has filed a police complaint against Saurav Raidhani for alleged stalking and harassment. The accused, whom she initially connected with on LinkedIn, reportedly sent obscene messages and unwanted advances over two years. Despite being blocked, he allegedly used over 100 SIM cards to contact her, even tracking her movements abroad.

title: No handshake could have been Suryakumar Yadav’s compulsion but that’s where it should have ended
'Project Firewall': H-1B visas to cost more, move to impact Indians
description: The US department of labour has launched "Project Firewall" to target H-1B visa misuse, aligning with President Trump's "America First" agenda. This initiative aims to protect American workers by scrutinising companies hiring foreign employees and ensuring fair wages. The secretary of labour will personally oversee investigations, with violators facing penalties like back wage repayment and program debarment, impacting industries heavily reliant on H-1B workers, especially Indian nationals.

title: Asia Cup: Sunil Gavaskar praises Suryakumar's decision on Oman
description: Sunil Gavaskar defended Suryakumar Yadav's choice to not bat against Oman, citing his unorthodox thinking and potential strategy to test Kuldeep Yadav's batting. Rohan Gavaskar questioned the move, suggesting Rinku Singh should have been given a chance instead. Despite the debate, India secured a 21-run victory, with experts highlighting Yadav's innovative captaincy and willingness to take risks.

title: Multiple Delhi schools receive bomb threats; students, staff evacuated
description: Several schools in Delhi, including DPS Dwarka and Krishna Model Public School, received bomb threat calls on Saturday, leading to immediate evacuations and extensive security sweeps. This incident follows a similar bomb threat at the Delhi High Court eight days prior, where an email alluded to a potential blast and alleged connections to Pakistani intelligence.

These images help astronomers study star formation, galactic dynamics, and the future collision with Andromeda, enhancing our understanding of our galactic home.

His impressive 64-run innings against India marked a historic moment, also making him the oldest to hit a T20I fifty against a full member nation.

title: Trump protects US jobs: H-1B fee hiked; what changes for Indian workers
description: President Trump has raised the H-1B visa sponsorship fee to $100,000 to prioritise American jobs and curb outsourcing. Indian professionals, who form the majority of H-1B holders, may face reduced opportunities, especially in junior roles. The change pressures companies like Amazon, Microsoft, and TCS to reconsider hiring strategies, shifting focus to highly specialised, high-wage talent and domestic graduates.

title: Turmoil, tragedy, and tenacity in Nepal
description: While resentment against the political class in Nepal had been brewing for a while, the government’s social media ban proved to be the last straw. On September 8, peaceful demonstrations against political misrule and corruption began. They quickly escalated into deadly clashes, leaving scores dead and the country at a critical political crossroads. Sanjeev Satgainya reports on how the popular discontent exploded on the streets

description: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce, engaged since August, are reportedly planning an intimate wedding for early next year. While no venue is set, Rhode Island is a potential location. Swift is enjoying the creative process, with designers eager to create her gown, but the couple prioritizes a meaningful celebration with loved ones over a lavish spectacle.

description: The US government has introduced a new visa program. It targets wealthy immigrants. The program offers American residency at high prices. A 'Trump Gold Card' costs $1 million. A 'Platinum Card' is priced at $5 million. Corporate investors can also participate. Donald Trump and Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick unveiled the initiative. It aims to attract investment and create jobs.

description: New American Heart Association guidelines redefine hypertension, lowering target blood pressure levels. The category of prehypertension is removed, replaced by 'elevated blood pressure'. title: Serena Williams net worth 2025: tennis legacy, endorsements, ventures
description: Serena Williams, a tennis icon, boasts a net worth of $350 million in 2025. Her wealth comes from tennis wins, endorsements, and business ventures. She supports businesses run by women and people of color through Serena Ventures. Recently, she invested in Unrivaled, a women’s basketball league. Serena also launched a podcast with her sister, Venus.

title: Swift faces backlash after Kelce supports suspended teammate
description: Travis Kelce's decision to wear a "Free 4" shirt in support of suspended teammate Rashee Rice has sparked controversy, drawing criticism from fans who deem it inappropriate given Rice's legal troubles stemming from a high-speed collision. The backlash extends to Taylor Swift, Kelce's fiancée, with some questioning her association with him.
